name: bikeability
summary: Calculate bikeability score for an area
description:
The bikeability command analyzes cycling infrastructure and calculates a comprehensive bikeability score (0-100). It evaluates:

- Dedicated infrastructure (cycleways, bike lanes, bike roads/Fahrradstrassen)
- Intersection safety (bike-car crossing danger analysis)
- Traffic separation (physical separation from car traffic)
- Road quality (surface types)
- Network connectivity (connected cycling routes)
- Bike facilities (parking, rental, repair stations)
- Traffic calming (low-speed streets, speed limits)

The analysis considers:
- Contraflow cycling allowances
- Segregated paths
- Signalized bike crossings
- Dangerous vs safe intersections where bike routes cross car roads

Returns a grade (A+ to F) with detailed breakdown.

options.--lat: Center latitude for analysis (default: map center)
options.--lon: Center longitude for analysis (default: map center)
options.-f, --format: Output format: text, json, geojson (default: text)

output:
Bikeability analysis including:
- Overall score (0-100) and grade (A+ to F)
- Component scores (infrastructure, intersection safety, separation, connectivity, facilities, traffic calming)
- Cycling infrastructure breakdown:
  - Dedicated cycleways (km)
  - Bike lanes (km)
  - Bike roads/Fahrradstrassen (km)
  - Separated from traffic (km)
  - Contraflow cycling (km)
- Intersection safety analysis:
  - Total bike-car intersections
  - Safe vs dangerous intersections
  - Signalized crossings
  - Average intersection safety score
- Network connectivity metrics
- Facility counts (parking, rental, repair stations, bike shops)
